body_html: I second this. My computation graph does not have any convolution operation but it still suffers from non-determinism. By sending the compute_gradients operation of AdamOptimizer to the CPU, the problem disappears. I'm running tf 1.8.

body: I second this. My computation graph does not have any convolution operation but it still suffers from non-determinism. By sending the compute_gradients operation of AdamOptimizer to the CPU, the problem disappears. I'm running tf 1.8.
